item.description:
Join Exemplar Entrepreneurs for our Quarterly Networking Party at the The Greatest Bar! Every quarter the largest entrepreneurs organization in Boston gets together for an evening of networking, fun, food and drinks at one of Boston's most popular bars. Join us in the classy 4th floor bar reserved exclusively for Exemplary Entrepreneurs for this fun and engaging evening!

-- Meet and Network with Boston's Best Entrepreneurs and Business Professionals

-- Cash Bar

-- Music

-- Hors D'oeuvres


Where: The Greatest Bar, 4th floor, in friend Street in Boston (Near the BankNorth Garden}

When: Thursday, April 3rd 6-9pm!


Questions; cmarston@exemplarlaw.com
item.how_to_find_us: Network with Entrepreneurs and Business Owners/Professionals from around Boston!~
item.name: Quartlery Networking Party at The Greatest Bar
